# bx-cmake
Stand-alone version of bx with CMake support.

| Platform    | Supported Compiler          |
| -           | -                           |
| Windows     | MSVC, GCC, Clang, MinGW-w64 |
| Linux       | GCC, Clang                  |
| Android     | To do                       |
| MacOS       | GCC, Clang                  |
| iOS         | Xcode(Clang)                |
